query:
SELECT 
  numeroCi,
  setorSolicitante,
  tipoServicoCompra,
  valorTotal / 100 AS valorReais,
  mesServico,
  detalhamento
FROM despesas_v2
WHERE numeroCi IN ('017/2025', '018/2025', '021/2025')
ORDER BY numeroCi
